summary: This is an email chain from July 2020 regarding granting access to a shared drive containing case materials related to the US v. Epstein investigation. The email includes an attached December 2019 memo summarizing the post-indictment investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Post-Epstein Indictment Investigation Summary
events.description: An update memo was prepared summarizing the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein following his indictment.

events.title: Request for Share Access
events.description: A request was made to grant access to the 'USv.Epstein-2018R01618' shared drive for review of case materials.

keyFacts: An email chain discusses granting access to a shared drive containing materials from the US v. Epstein case (docket 2018R01618).
An attached memo from December 2019 summarizes the post-indictment investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.
The correspondence indicates that 'PC chiefs and brass' previously had access to the shared drive, suggesting internal review of the case materials.
The email is dated July 2020, after Epstein's death in August 2019, indicating ongoing case review or related proceedings.
The document reference 'EFTA00080956' is part of a larger document set released in relation to the Epstein case.
